mapper.insert: insert into JH_Auth_Version (ID, VERSION, VERSION_CONTENT, READ_USERS, REMARK, COM_ID, DEL_FLG, UP_USER, UP_DATE, CR_USER, CR_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{readUsers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{upUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{crUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
